con:request.name: Refund - Full (Debit 1)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:ProcessCreditCard> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:Amount>${AmountDebit}</acr1:Amount> <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:CardExpirationDate>1225</acr1:CardExpirationDate> <acr1:CardLastFourDigits>${DebitCardLastFour}</acr1:CardLastFourDigits> <acr1:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:CardVerificationNumber xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode> <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr1:CustomerCode> <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:CustomerZipCode xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber> <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:NameOnCard xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:ReferenceNumber>${#[Refund Manager#Original Trx#Debit 1]#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Responses'; //ns1:ProcessDebitCardResponse[1]/ns1:ProcessDebitCardResult[1]/a:ReferenceNumber[1]}</acr1:ReferenceNumber> <acr1:TaxAmount>0</acr1:TaxAmount> <acr1:TransactionType>Refund</acr1:TransactionType> </tem:request> </tem:ProcessCreditCard> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
